General.Name: Henan Liliang Diamond Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Henan Liliang Diamond Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of synthetic diamond products in China. The company's products include diamond micro and mesh powders, industrial diamond abrasives, yellow single crystal diamonds, white rough diamonds, octahedral sharp pointed diamonds, and coated diamond micro powders. Its products are used for cutting, sawing, drilling, polishing, PCD and PDC, resin tools, resin grinding wheels, as well as other general applications in processing area, such as stone, glass, ceramics, silicon chip, sapphire, precision ceramics, optical lenses, optical fiber communications, and other industries. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.
